description: The queen of Georgia and daughter of the great Tamar. However, she has inherited only beauty from her mother, not the love for her people. Without regard, she exploits her people to pursue her personal goals.
victory_3: My kingdom triumphs; the blood will flow!
ally_death: A great queen never admits defeat!
congrats: With an iron hand and a steel will.
help: Those who disregard a royal command will die!
extra: Bloodshed means glory; the feared queen reigns the longest.
siege: My nobles are oiling their armor. Soon they will be ready for the siege...
no_attack_1: Your plans are as weak as you are!
no_attack_2: Your plans are as weak as you are!
team_winning: I am always three steps ahead of the others.
team_losing: You aren't even fit to be a court jester.
help_sent: I am curious about what awaits me.
